display_long_description:
# THE NUMBER #1 VR BATTLE ROYALE IS FREE TO PLAY!

CLIMB, FLY, BUILD. POPULATION: ONE is a multiplayer, First Person Shooter only possible in VR. 

GET POPULATION ONE TODAY AND GET 300 IN-GAME GOLD FREE.*

[media]

# Fly & Climb Anywhere

POPULATION: ONE delivers unparalleled vertical freedom and mobility with its unique Vertical combat System

[media]

# Explore Battle Royale and Custom Sandbox Modes/Maps

Group up with your squad for a Battle Royale victory across numerous maps or explore Sandbox, player created maps with multiple game modes.

[media]

Check back frequently for new, live in-game events and fresh content to explore!

# POPULATION: ONE also features a wide variety of rotating PvP and PvE modes for your squad to play including:

● Battle Royale

● Phoenix Royale

● Sandbox: Player-created Games (Custom maps and rules) 

● Team Deathmatch with customizable loadouts

● War mode (12v12)

● Legions mode (6v6v6v6)

● Metropolis Royale

● Single Player Mode

● Co-Op Bot Battle

● Duos

● Hangouts 

● Training Park Practice and Social Hub


*Limited time offer. Offer subject to restrictions and change without notice.
